about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a passionate frontend developer with 1 year of experience in web design and development, combining impressive design with intuitive functionality. I constantly seek creative solutions to deliver an optimal user experience. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I’m continuously learning modern frameworks like React to build high-quality, interactive web applications.
about.description2: My approach blends strong technical skills with creative problem-solving. I prioritize writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code that provides a solid foundation for future development. Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring emerging technologies, contributing to open-source projects, playing football, listening to music, and watching movies to relax and stay inspired.

projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects. Each one showcases different skills and technologies.

projectDescriptions.1: A web application for managing student activities in the Faculty of Information Technology. Features include event management, user authentication, and a modern UI built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projectDescriptions.2: A travel booking website that allows users to search for flights, hotels, and car rentals. Features include a responsive design, user authentication, and a modern UI.
projectDescriptions.3: A responsive portfolio website template for developers, built with modern design principles and animations.
projectDescriptions.4: A sports tracking platform built with HTML, CSS và JavaScript, Node.js và MongoDB. Features include displaying, creating, deleting, editing sports matchups, and tracking competing teams, with a responsive interface for easy management.
projectDescriptions.5: A fun and interactive number clicking game built with React. The goal is to click on numbers in order as fast as possible. It includes score tracking, timer, autoplay mode, and responsive design for desktop and mobile devices.
